title: Photon properties - wavelength of 4 eV photon

content.question: What is the wavelength of a photon that has an energy of <math alttext="4.0 electron volts" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>eV</mtext></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="5.0 times 10 raised to the negative 26 power meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>26</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></math>

<math alttext="3.1 times 10 raised to the negative 7 power meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></math>

<math alttext="9.7 times 10 raised to the fourteenth power meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>9.7</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>14</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></math>

<math alttext="6.0 times 10 raised to the thirty-third power meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>6.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>33</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="3.1 times 10 raised to the negative 7 power meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3.1</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
